scripts.pm2start: export NODE_ENV=production && pm2-runtime start ecosystem.config.js --env production
scripts.devStartWindows: set DEBUG=app:* farm_mail_password=123 farm_jwtPrivateKey=1234 && nodemon server.js
scripts.devStart: export NODE_ENV=development DEBUG=app:* farm_mail_password=123 farm_jwtPrivateKey=1234 && nodemon server.js
